title: New: Paperwhite – got me goin
body:
Comprised of brother / sister duo Ben and Katie Marshall, New York duo **Paperwhite** are about as new as they come.

Debut track _got me goin_ is four and a half minutes of expertly composed synth-pop, citing the likes of HAERTS and BROODS as their contemporaries. Sure to gain them a dedicated blogger following, it’s a mightily promising first outing.
